name: Pefs Pageloader
author: Peter Frank

sections.installation:
Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

Â 

Then activate the pageloader by using the tag** [pageloader] **where you would like to see the time it took for the page to be rendered.
sections.faq:
**Q: **How dp i choose where to print the \”render time\”

A: **By using the shortcode **[pageloader]
sections.description:
This plugin is a very simple tool that allows the user to show the render speed of the content between the header and footer tag.
